name: Fire Flora #41
description:
Working across the disciplines of painting and digital media, I use my work as a platform to raise awareness about the ecological perils facing the planet. This artwork was made with fire itself after horrendous bushfires devastated my region on the south-east coast of Australia in 2019/20. Here, a ghostly computer-generated floral motive floats above a charred and abraded background, foreshadowing the possible extinction of life on Earth.

https://linktr.ee/KatherineBoland
